HOW TO FIND A RECIPE
Tap on the FIND RECIPE button on the main screen.
Select CATEGORY (ex breakfast) and TYPE (ex. Italian) from the dropdown menus at the top of the screen. Any will search through all categories/types.
Select the desired ingredients scrolling through the ingredient list and tapping on the checkboxes next to the ingredient name.
Tap on the NEXT button at the bottom of the screen to bring up the page exclude ingredients.
Select the ingredients to exclude by scrolling through the ingredient list and tapping on the checkboxes next to the ingredient name.
Tap the FINISH button to view a list of recipes that match the selected criteria. These recipes are categorized in descending order based on the number of matching ingredients.
Tap on the desired recipe to bring up its respective page.
HOW TO ADD A NEW RECIPE
Tap on the EDIT RECIPE button on the main screen.
Tap the ADD RECIPE button to bring up the recipe creation page.
Enter the recipe name at the top of the screen.
Enter the preparation time (time before cooking, ex. chopping vegetables) in minutes, in its respective text field.
Enter the cook time (time taken to cook the dish) in minutes, into its respective text field.
Enter the amount of calories into its text field.
Select the category (ex lunch) and types (ex Indian) from the dropdown menus.
Select the desired ingredients by scrolling through the ingredient list and tapping the checkboxes next to the ingredient name.
Tap on the CREATE button to go to add directions page.
Enter the direction in the text field and tap on the ADD button to add it to the list of directions for the recipe.
Tap on the CREATE button to create the new recipe.
HOW TO EDIT A RECIPE
Tap on the EDIT RECIPE button on the main screen.
Tap the EDIT RECIPE button to bring up the recipe edit page.
Scroll through the list of recipes and tap the one you wish to edit. This brings up the page for the recipe.
Edit the desired recipe properties.
HOW TO DELETE A RECIPE
Tap on the EDIT RECIPE button on the main screen.
Tap the DELETE RECIPE button to bring up the recipe edit page.
Scroll through the list of recipes and tap the one you wish to delete.
HOW TO EDIT THE INGREDIENT LIST
Tap on the EDIT INGREDIENTS button on the main screen.
Type in the ingredient you wish to add or remove from the ingredient list, into the text field at the top left of the screen.
Tap the ADD button to add the new ingredient to the list or tap the DELETE button to remove the ingredient from the list.
